Subramanya C R wrote:

> Hi,
>  
> One more addition to "Windows XP" problem.
>  
> "heritrix-1.4.0.zip"  doesn't contain the default profile.

Its actually bundled into the heritrix jar and loaded off the CLASSPATH.

> I tried in Linux (with same zip file),  it works without the default 
> profile.
> I could not go deep into this, where this default profile is taken or 
> created (without physical profile file).
>  

> Solution:
> 1. Create a directory "profiles" in <Heritrix_home>/conf/
> 2. Copy default profiles from  "heritrix-1.4.0-src.zip" --> 
> *src*/conf/profiles/*.*
>  

This sounds like we're failing to find profiles on a windows CLASSPATH. 
We must be doing something wrong in the way we compose the CLASSPATH 
path-to-profiles: http://crawler.archive.org/xref/index.html.

Yours,
St.Ack

> Now Heritrix works as given in the "user manual" chapter 4.
> **********
> http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual.html#tutorial
> **********
>  
>  
> Thanks,
> Subramanya C R
